title: Drawing, "American Falls, Goat Island and Part of Horseshoe Falls, Seen from the Canadian Bank of the Niagara River", possibly 1858
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown wove paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped at upper left: Lugt 457c 
Verso:  Stamped at center: 457d, noir
inscribed: Numbered in graphite, at lower left: 2
description: Horizontal view showing from the Canadian bank of the river the remaining part of Horseshoe Falls [not seen in -b], Goat Island and the American Falls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "American Falls, Goat Island and Part of Horseshoe Falls, Seen from the Canadian Bank of the Niagara River", possibly 1858.
possibly 1858. Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-142-a.
